name: Sentinel OT
category: Passive ICS Intelligence, SCADA Vulnerability Lead Generation
description: Sentinel OT identifies publicly accessible industrial control systems, validates firmware-specific vulnerabilities against the NVD, attributes devices to their operators through multi-signal analysis, and delivers the findings as qualified, sales-ready lead packages for system integrators and OT security providers.

services.name: Pulse Feed
services.description: Monthly subscription of qualified SCADA vulnerability leads with firmware-validated CVEs, operator attribution, and decision-maker contacts.

services.name: Boutique Leads
services.description: Individual qualified intelligence packages built to order for specific regions, industries, or vendor types.

services.name: Territory Exclusives
services.description: Exclusive lead coverage for a defined geographic territory or industry vertical.

capabilities.cveValidation: Firmware-version-level matching against NVD CPE version ranges
capabilities.attributionMethod: Multi-signal: EPA ECHO, state regulatory databases, property records, ICS protocol banner analysis, professional network research
capabilities.dataCollection: 100% passive. Public internet-wide scan databases, regulatory filings, property records. No active scanning.

deliverableFormat: Branded PDF intelligence reports with operator identity, device inventory, validated CVEs, risk assessment, project scope estimate, and decision-maker contacts

legal.dataPolicy: Public and passive sources only. Data provided for defensive modernization purposes.
